DiffEqFinancial.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    DiffEqFinancial.BlackScholesProblem — Type.

    $d \ln S(t) = (r(t) - \frac{Θ(t,S)^2}{2})dt + σ dW_t$

    Solves for $log S(t)$.

    DiffEqFinancial.DiffEqFinancial
    DiffEqFinancial.ExtendedOrnsteinUhlenbeckProblem — Function.

    $dx = a(b(t)-x)dt + σ dW_t$

    DiffEqFinancial.GeneralizedBlackScholesProblem — Function.

    $d \ln S(t) = (r(t) - q(t) - \frac{Θ(t,S)^2}{2})dt + σ dW_t$

    Solves for $log S(t)$.

    DiffEqFinancial.GeometricBrownianMotionProblem — Function.

    $dx = μ dt + σ dW_t$

    DiffEqFinancial.HestonProblem — Function.
    \[dS = μSdt + \sqrt{v}SdW_1 dv = κ(Θ-v)dt + σ\sqrt{v}dW_2 dW_1 dW_2 = ρ dt\]
    DiffEqFinancial.MfStateProblem — Function.

    $dx = σ(t)e^{at} dW_t$

    DiffEqFinancial.OrnsteinUhlenbeckProblem — Function.

    $dx = a(r-x)dt + σ dW_t$

    DiffEqFinancial.eval
